translation.Message_0_Page_0: Hm. Well, <color=epic>Major Sydney</color> is leading our operations group, she will likely need some help with getting supplies in order to surmount the difficulty of finding people.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: <color=epic>Major Kriss</color> is leading our combat group, so they might need some more equipment or such. Probably more ammo or arms.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: <color=epic>Major Grant</color> leads our logistics group, so he could use a bit of funding. The logistics group can get you things in exchange for some local currency.
